title: Function calling and other API updates
summary: OpenAI has extended support for the gpt-3.5-turbo-0301, gpt-4-0314, and gpt-4-32k-0314 models until at least June 13, 2024, based on feedback from customers and the community. The company is working on improving newer models across various aspects, such as instruction following and factual accuracy. They have introduced function calling capabilities in the Chat Completions API, updated versions of gpt-4 and gpt-3.5-turbo, and reduced the cost of their state-of-the-art embeddings model and input tokens for gpt-3.5-turbo. OpenAI is also announcing the deprecation timeline for the gpt-3.5-turbo-0301 and gpt-4-0314 models.
